item.title: Bird Museum
item.description: Introduction This is a 4 weeks task, we need to find a set of images and make an app for this image set focusing on Ui & UX. My image set is a collection of birds and I want to make a bird species guide from it. Brief A funnier bird species guide aims at encouraging people to know and explore more bird species. Users can view and recognize the birds thorough the sounds, location and drawing, besides that, users can also recognize the bird species by photos and add those bird species into their collection just like a bird version Pokémon Go.

item.title: Ship O’hoi
item.description: An interactive ship controller, when people’s hand get close to the controller (don’t have to touch), the graph which is related to the controller will pop out to help the boat driver get the information easier. Backround Research this is one project of tangible interaction class, the theme which we choose is ship controller Field Observation After visiting the USN (an university in Norway which aims to educate the captain and has the Simulated bridge), Lilaas(an company designs and produces the boat controller ), and talking with the real captain, we find that there are so many controllers on the boat and different controllers are related to different graph on the screen, besides that, there are also many screen on the boat.

item.title: Elvelangs-Hug
item.description: An interactive device cooperating with Stiftelsen Organdonasjon to help more people know dead organ donation. Topic Source This project is one of our tangible interaction project and we cooperate with a organ donation organization of Oslo named Stiftelsen Organdonasjon, theme to introduce the idea of dead organ donation to more people. And this Interactive device finally showed in the light show called Elvelangs and attracted a lot of people. One For Seven After their introduction, we thinked various of ideas.

item.title: Life Wave
item.description: Design brief Information is the essence of life. This design focuses on propagating a certain kind of electromagnetic waves towards the universe which is based on the analysis of the DNA of the pets. As a result, the traces of the pets’ life can stay for a rather long time, or even forever. This way of handling the body of pets doesn’t occupy any physical space. This kind of electromagnetic waves can’t be touched or felt by human, however, they do exist.

item.title: Plantales
item.description: Design brief “Plantales” hope to create planting area for the elderly through overall arrangement of open space in the community, such as the roofs. We invite the elderly people to join us and divide them into groups. At the beginning, we will provide lectures，workshops and materials to teach them planting skills. Then there will be parent-child activities, cooperation with community kindergartens, and so on. After harvest, we will organize activities to distribute the vegetables to other lonely elderly in the communities.
